entities.name: dolores jane umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Jane Umbridge is mentioned as the Senior Undersecretary to the Minister. She is introduced in the text as a part of the hearing.

entities.name: percy ignatius weasley
entities.description: Percy Ignatius Weasley is mentioned as the Court Scribe. He is introduced in the text as a part of the hearing.

entities.name: albus percival wulfric brian dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is mentioned as the witness for the defense. He is introduced in the text with a detailed description of his appearance.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being looked at by Dumbledore through half-moon spectacles. He is not described in detail but is part of the scene.

relationships.description: Dumbledore looked up at Fudge through half-moon spectacles. This shows a relationship between Dumbledore and Fudge where Dumbledore is observing Fudge.
A powerful emotion had risen in Harry's chest at the sight of Dumbledore, indicating that Harry admired or looked up to Dumbledore.
